text:
I'm going to add some roles to what my colleague posted to cover more Product and SRE orientated roles. In general, we are looking for folks that have an entrepreneurial mindset. All based in Amsterdam except for one in Seattle and one in Shanghai:

- Product Onwer [SHANGHAI] - http://grnh.se/mawtj31

- Product Owner - Infrastructure - http://grnh.se/epigdw1

Feel free to reach out to me if you are interested in the Product roles and I can tell you all about the experience of working as a Product Owner - Infra @ Booking (Technical Product Owner). I relocated with my family from Dublin, Ireland.

- Senior Product Owner - http://grnh.se/ojtu041

Other roles in Core Infra

Hear from some of the folks working in Core Infra https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i7S10eO4ZnY

- Technical Program Manager - http://grnh.se/0erimt1

- Database Reliability Engineer - http://grnh.se/6kb0j51

- Site Reliability Engineer - http://grnh.se/ur487v1

- Team Lead - Site Reliability Engineer - http://grnh.se/vcrpbk1

- Site Reliability Engineer [SEATTLE] - http://grnh.se/1np7lx1

Contact me on dkhylan+hn at that popular Google email provider, think you can guess it ;)
